lead_paragraph: AOL has purchased a location-based social networking service called Rally Up for an undisclosed sum, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: AOL has purchased location-based social networking service Rally Up for an undisclosed sum, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: AOL Buys Rally Up, a Mobile Social Service

abstract: AOL has purchased location-based social networking service Rally Up for an undisclosed sum, The Associated Press reported.
